Does not necessarily imply expertise the way {mafcre} does. See also {mafcre}, {fantasi}, {makfyfi'a}.
$r_1$=$m_3$ casts magic spell $r_2$=$m_1$ at target $r_3$, $r_1$=$m_3$ is a "spellslinger".

Suggests a somewhat violent action, like the casting of a curse or hex, and implies hurling it over some distance. For simply using or invoking a magic spell, use {mafpli}. See also {mafpli}, {malmakfa}, {fantasi}, {makfyfi'a}.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ millimeters of mercury by standard $x_3$.
$x_1$ is an amalgam of composition including $x_2$.
$x_1$ (number) is the date/day notation of the month of event/state $x_2$, in system $x_3$.
{masti} zei {djedi} zei {detri}. As default, the number $x_1$ is counted from the first day of the month. See {de'i'o} for BAI. See also {detke'u}.
$x_1$ (number) is the month notation of the date of event/state $x_2$, in system $x_3$.

{masti} zei {detri}. As default, the number $x_1$ is counted from the first month of the year. See {de'i'i} for BAI. See also {detke'u}; {masnpa}, {masnre}, {masnci}, {masnvo}, {masnmu}, {masnxa}, {masnze}, {masnbi}, {masnso}, {masndau}, {masnfei}, {masngai}, {masnjau}, {masnrei}, {masnxei}, {masnvai}.
$x_1$ (number) is the week notation of the month of event/state $x_2$, in system $x_3$.
{masti} zei {jeftu} zei {detri}. As default, the number $x_1$ is counted from the first week of the month. See also {detke'u}.
$k_1$ is an elementary fermion [quark or lepton]/matter particle/smallest measurable increment of matter/property/activity $k_2$=$m_1$.
$z_1$ physically exists/is a physical reality for $z_2$ under metaphysics$z_3$.

$x_1$=$s_1$=$m_1$ is the material environment/surrounding material (i.e. gaseous/liquid atmosphere, vacuum, etc.) enclosing $x_2$=$s_2$ in direction(s)/dimensions(s)/plane $x_3$=$s_3$=$m_3$, of type/composition including $x_4$=$m_2$.

A vacuum is arguably not 'material', but the word is much more convenient if that is included.  Also, vacuum is never completely empty.  See also {marji}, {sruri}, {gapci}, {litki}, {kunti}, {sakci}, {kensa}.
$m_1$=$b_1$(material) undergoes metabolism, replaced by $b_2$ under condition $b_3$
$x_1$ creates / materializes / builds / makes $x_2$ out of / having it composed of $x_3$ and having shape / form $x_4$
$x_1$ is massive, $x_1$ has a great mass by standard or relatively to $x_2$ (plural)
$c_1$ is fantasy/magic-oriented fiction about plot/theme/subject $c_2$ by author $c_3$, based on magic $m_1$
$x_1$ is an MRI (magnetic resonance imaging) machine.
Also sometimes called an NMR (nuclear magnetic resonance).
$x_1$=$m_1$ is a magnetic stripe card reader for use/function $x_2$=$m_2$, accepting card $x_3$=$k_1$
General reader of cards with magnetic stripes ({maksriveikarda}). For payment card reader see {lejykardymi'i}). Cf. {kardyckiku}.
$x_1$=$k_1$ is a magnetic stripe card storing $x_2$=$v_2$ (data/facts/du'u) about $x_3$=$v_3$ (object/event)
Read by a magnetic card reader ({maksrikardymi'i}). Cf. {vreji}, {datni}, {makyvelvei}, {cukmakyvelvei}, {srimakyvelvei}, {cukmirvelvei}, {kardyckiku}.
$x_1$ is magnetism (charge; possibly current) in/on $x_2$ of polarity/quantity $x_3$ (default: south)

Uses experimental gismu {tcaxe}. The possible connotation of a current is for symmetry with {dikca} but is arguably not denotationally implied by {tcaxe}. The south polarity is treated as positive; this is counter to typical electromagnetic convention, but follows from the default of {dikca} to be negative.
c1 is an electromagnetic relay which allows electric current $c_2 = df_1$ to flow under conditions c3 in / on / through $df_2$ flowing in direction to / towards $df_3$ from direction/source $df_4$.

This only covers relays that operate using a solenoid to magnetically attract one or more moving parts. This includes reed relays and mercury relays, but not solid-state relays. Cf. {maksi}, {dicflecru}, {dicfle}, {dicka'u}.
$v_4$=$m_1$ is a magnetic storage medium storing $v_2$ (data/facts/du'u) about $v_3$ (object/event) in file(s) $v_1$.
$s_1$ is an idol/a sign/symbol representing god/demon/property (perjorative sense) $s_2$ to observer $s_3$.
In the Bible the gods and their images were first conceived of as identical; but in later times a distinction was drawn between the god and the image.
$m_1$=$c_1$ is a derogatory / abusive / insulting name for $m_2$=$c_2$ as used by $m_3$=$c_3$; $m_3$=$c_3$ "name-calls" $m_1$=$c_1$.
Also a prejudicial epithet / slur. See also {malvla}, {malvlatutle}, {skuxai}, {cnixai}, {kuskei}.
$x_1$ is a curse / bad fate upon $x_2$ ; $x_2$ is cursed / accursed.
$f_1$=$m_1$ is vulgar/uncouth in property $f_2$=$m_2$ (ka) among members $f_3$ (set).
$f_1$=$m_2$ (event/property) is determined by the bad luck/fortune of $f_2$.
$x_1$ is to blame / blamed / responsible (negative sense) for $x_2$ (event/action), according to $x_3$
$x_1$ wishes that misfortune $x_2$ (property of $x_3$) happens to $x_3$
$g_1$=$m_1$ is an anglicism (in Lojban), inappropriate according to $m_3$.

Refers to any kind of reliance upon English in a Lojban expression, but is most common for calques. Is sometimes even extended to cover reliance upon cultural assumptions. “malglico” is a much more common form. See {malglixlu}.
$x_1$=$m_1$=$g_1$=$xl_3$ is an inappropriate anglicism made by $x_2$=$xl_2$, inappropriate according to $x_3$=$m_3$

Refers to any kind of inappropriate reliance upon English in a Lojban (or non-English language) expression, but is most common for calques. Is sometimes even extended to cover reliance upon cultural assumptions. This lujvo is made to have more-specific rafsi-connotations than the historical lujvo-term "malglico" (under {malgli}), and to avoid possible clashing with the common lujvo construction of "malbroda" meaning "d**ned broda / broda in a bad way". The $xl_2$ place is also useful, allowing (mi se malglixlu) and (di'u malglixlu mi)
$mak_1$ is black magic to $mak_2$, performed by person/force/deity $mak_3$.
$ma_1$=$mi_1$=$g_2$ is ill-lit with light $g_1$ from light source $g_3$.
$n_1$ (agent) punishes $n_2$ [recipient] for atypical $n_3$ (event/property) with punishment/penalty/demerit $n_4$. It’s a interpreted as a punishment according $m_3$.
$x_1$ is [malware/malicious software/computer virus] for purpose $x_2$ on computer(s) including $x_3$
$mas_1$ is sluggish at doing/being/bringing about $mas_2$ (event/state) according to $mab_3$.
$x_1$ discriminates against (holds a negative stereotype of) $x_2$, assigning stereotype $x_3$
$x_1$ is a "bad word" / swear-word meaning $x_2$ in language $x_3$
$m_1$=$v_1$ is a racial/ethnic slur for $v_2$=$t_1$ in language $v_3$.
$x_1$ infests/damnedly lives in $x_2$, terrible by standard/according to $x_3$

Large plurality not implied, since, for example, instead of a thousand cockroaches infesting your house, you could have one cockroach that's one thousand times the size of a regular one infesting your house. See also {jalra}, {mabla}, {xabju}, {infeste}.
$m_1$=$b_1$ is a cow [an adult female bovine] of variety/breed $b_2$ that has had calf/calves $m_2$
$m_1$=$c_1$ (quoted word(s)) is a/the matronymic [a personal name based on the name of one's mother] of $m_2$=$c_2$ to/used-by namer/name-user $c_3$ (person).
$g_1$ has sex/copulates with the mother of $g_2$=$m_2$.
$m_1$=$j_1$ is a hen of species/breed $j_2$ with offspring $x_3$=$m_2$.
$x_1$ is a step-parent via the mother of $x_2$ due to marriage with the latter's mother according to law/custom $x_3$, where said motherhood is not necessarily biological.
$x_1$ does not necessarily raise $x_2$ (for such a purpose, append "{rirni}" vel sim. as a tertau). The gender of $x_1$ is not specified. See also: "{pa'uspe}", {rirspe}, {spemamta}.
$b_1$=$m_1$ is an ingot [uniformly shaped block] of material $b_2$ with surfaces/sides $b_3$.
$t_1$=$m_1$ is livery/[a uniform] for wearing by $t_2$ for purpose $t_3$.
$g_1$=$m_2$ is contently happy about/with $m_1$ with regard to $g_2$=$m_3$ (event/state).
$n_1$ needs $n_2$ to be satisfied for reason $x_3$.
$n_2$ must be a physical object, not an event; for that, use {djica}. See also: {mansa}, {nitcu}
$mam_1$ is an ant queen of ants $mam_2$=$man_1$ of species/breed $man_2$.
$x_1$ is a park where live cmavo are exhibited.
$x_1$=$l_1$ is a list of structure words $x_2$=$l_2$=$c_1$ of class(es) $x_5$=$c_2$ of language $x_6$=$c_3$ in order $x_3$=$l_3$ in medium $x_4$=$l_4$.
$x_1$=$s_1$=$m_1$ is a quantity of fluffy-sugar/cotton candy/candy floss/fairy floss from source $x_2$=$s_2$ and composition $x_3$=$s_3$=$m_2$
$p_1$ is a hatter/millner /[hat maker] selling/making hats of material $m_2$.
$x_1$ is a crested penguin (gen. Eudyptes) of type/species $x_2$
$x1$=$t1$ is a vehicle registration plate of vehicle $x2$=$t2$=$c2$=$m1$ showing information $x3$=$t3$=$n1$=$c1$
$x1$=$t1$ is a vehicle registration plate of vehicle $x2$=$mi2$=$ma1$ showing information $x3$=$t3$=$mi1$
$x_1$ qualifies as / counts as being $x_2$ (ka) by standard $x_3$
$s_1$ is a spliff/cigarette made from marijuana and tobacco $s_2$=$m_1$=$t_1$ by $s_3$.
$s_1$ is a joint/spliff/cigarette made from marijuana $s_2$=$m_1$ by $s_3$.
$x_1$ is a little lesser than $x_2$ in dimension $x_3$; $x_1$ is almost as $x_3$ as $x_2$ is
$ml_1$ is a temple/side of forehead belonging to $me_2$
$b_1$=$m_1$ is a/the frontal bone [os frontale] performing function $b_2$ in body of $b_3$=$m_2$

$x_1$ underestimates the value satisfying $x_2$ (ka/ni) by amount $x_3$, underestimated with likelihood $x_4$; $x_2$ (property) is satisfied by a number greater by amount $x_3$ than that expected by $x_1$ with likelihood $x_4$
$me_1$=$t_1$ is least beautiful among set/range $t_3$ to $m_2$ in aspect $me_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $me_4$.
$m_1$=$n_1$ is a negative number relative to origo $m_2$.
$m_1$=$t_1$ is the least of $m_2$=$t_4$ in property $m_3$ (ka/ni) by amount $m_4$.
$x_1$ (number) is the supremum of set $x_2$ under (partial) ordering $x_3$

x2 must be a set; although it is standard (and lazy) mathematical practice to speak of "the supremum of a function" (including sequences) in some domain or to constrain the supremum with respect to certain variables in some way, all of these features can and ought to be constraints defining the set of which the supremum is taken; in Lojban, no leeway is given toward such sloppiness. See also: {zmaraimecna'u}, {nacyzmarai}.
$x_1$ happens less often than $x_2$ in interval $x_3$
$me_1$=$t_1$ is least ugly among set/range $t_3$ to $me_2$ in aspect $me_3$ (ka) by aesthetic standard $me_4$.
$x_1$ dislikes $x_2$ less than $x_3$; $x_1$ would rather have $x_2$ than $x_3$
Similar to {zmanei}, but implies choosing the lesser of two evils. See {mleca}, {tolnei}
$t_1$=$b_1$ is the smallest/[ least big] among set/range $t_4$  in property/dimension(s) $b_2$ (ka).
$t_1$=$c_1$ is the biggest/[ least small] among set/range $t_4$  in property/dimension(s) $c_2$ (ka).
$x_1$ is less than or equal to $x_2$ in property/quantity $x_3$ by amount $x_4$.
$t_1$=$x_1$ is the worst among set/range $t_4$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$m_1$=$x_1$ is the best/[least bad] among set/range $t_4$ for $x_2$ by standard $x_3$.
$se1$ is (close to) a million of eight indivisible, most basic computer subunits of computer $se2$; se1 is a megabyte
In binary a megabyte is actually 1 048 576 bytes, but we can round off for brevity, and to parallel the metric units.
$d1$ is $d2$ full megadays (million day unit) in duration (default is 1 megaday) by standard $d3$
For use with metric dating system.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ tonne(s) [metric unit] in mass (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_1$=$moi_1$ is the $x_2$-th element out of $x_3$ elements from set $x_4$=$moi_2$=$mei_2$.
$x_3$ is the total number of elements in set $x_3$. Cf. {mei}, {moi}.
$s_1$ is a sister's spouse of $m_2$ under law/custom/tradition/system/convention $sp_3$.
$x_1$ is more numerous than $x_2$; $x_1$ has a greater cardinality than $x_2$
$x_1$ is the Malaysia country, for people $x_2$
$r_1$ is measured in malaysian ringgit (MYR) as $r_2$ (quantity), in the Algerian monetary system $r_3$.
$x_1$ is an operator/mathematical function/single-valued mapping from domain $x_2$ to range $x_3$ defined by mathematical expression/rule $x_4$.
$x_1$ is the value of expression $x_2$ in base/convention $x_3$.
$x_1$ is an operand of operator $x_2$ filling place $x_3$ under rules/convention $x_4$.
$x_1$ is/are $x_2$ (li) in number, and are among $x_3$
This definition is based on the BPFK definition of {mei}. See also {mei}.
$x_1$ numbers/adds up to/consists of $x_2$ (number) counting by units $x_3$; $x_1$ are $x_2$ in number.

$f_1$=$m_1$ (event) is a mental event that happens/occurs/takes place in a/the mind of $m_2$; x1 is an incident/happening/occurrence of thought/dream/feeling/realization or any other mental activity .
$x_1$ is psychic magic/power to $x_2$ performed by $x_3$.
$m_1$ is a psychologist/psychiatrist/counsellor/mental health practitioner of client $m_2$ treating ailment $m_3$ with treatment $m_4$.
$x_1$=$melbi_1$=$menli_2$ has a mind that is beautiful to $x_2$=$melbi_2$ in aspect $x_3$=$melbi_3$.
$g_1$=$me_1$ telekinetically / with its mind moves $mu_1$ to destination/receiver $mu_2$ [away] from origin $mu_3$ over path/route $mu_4$
Made from {menli}+{muvgau}.  {menli}2 dropped on account of irrelevancy.  See also {gasnu}, {klama}, {litru}, {makfa}, {menli}, {muvdu}.
$x_1$ (person) is neurodivergent in property/aspect $x_2$ (ka) among members of $x_3$.

$x_1$ has a brain that functions in ways that diverge significantly from the dominant societal standards of "normal." This is a broad term: it includes autism, dyslexia, schizophrenia, Tourette syndrome, ADHD, et cetera.
$x_1$=$k_1$ is able to distinguish between $x_2$=$ms_1$ and $x_3$=$ms_2$ under conditions $x_4$=$k_3$
$x_1$=$k_1$ is able to distinguish between $x_2$=$ms_1$ and $x_3$=$ms_2$ under conditions $x_4$=$k_3$
$s_1$ (mass of facts) is mental science/psychology about subject matter $s_2$ based on methodology $s_3$.
$x_1$ uses reverse-psychology/psychologically-based trick $x_2$ (abstraction; instance or idea of the trick) against $x_3$ in order to effect $x_4$.
$n_1$ is psychological warfare on the part of $d_1$.
$z_1$ is purple (mental combination of red and blue) [color adjective].
Created to distinguish between purple as a mental construct and violet as a place on the physical color spectrum. See {gusyzi'u}.
$m_1$=$b_1$ is the American English language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$m_1$=$g_1$ is the United States of America.
$m_1$=$j_1$ is a president of the United States of America.
$j_1$=$m_1$ is the United State of America as a state.
A U.S. state, or any part of a federation is referred to as {gugypau}. Cf. {merko}, {jecta}, {bemro}.
$x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of americium [Am]
Pertaining to the United States and Canada. Cf. {merko}, {kadno}, {bemro}, {bemjoitco}
$t_1$ is a government of the United States of America.
$x_1$ (number) is the second/second notation of the minute, of event/state $x_2$, in system $x_3$.

{cacra} zei {mentu} zei {tcika}. As default, the number $x_1$ is counted from the first second of the minute. See {ti'u'i} for BAI. ex.) li voxa cu metnidytcika lo nu samymri ti mi kei u'y ty cy (This was e-mailed to me at 46 seconds past the minute UTC.)
$s_1$  is a mexican salsa verde  [sauce] for use with $s_2$, containing ingredient(s) including $s_3$.
$r_1$ is measured in mexican peso (MXN) as $r_2$ (quantity), in the Mexican monetary system $r_3$.
$m_1$=$b_1$ is the Mexican Spanish language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$s_1$  is a mexican salsa negra [sauce] for use with $s_2$, containing ingredient(s) including $s_3$.
See also: {mi'afra} (to laugh at something, not neccessarily mockingly), {cisma}, {ckasu}.
$p_1$ (agent) tickles $p_2$ with $p_3$ (a locus on $p_1$ or an instrument) at $p_4$ (a locus on $p_2$).
$t_1$=$c_1$ is tired/hurting/in stitches from laughing; $t_1$=$c_1$ laughs so hard it hurts.
Typical pain loci include the cheeks and abdomen. Some may also cry. Cf. {cortu}, {klaku}.
$x_1$ is a first-person perspective (frame of reference), observing $x_2$, with rules $x_3$
$c_1$ is a first person pronoun in language $c_4$.
$x1$=$k1$ comes to me from $x2$=$k3$ via route $x3$=$k4$ by means $x4$=$k5$
Used instead of {mi} when a brivla is needed.
$m_1$=$g_1$ uses surgical implement $k_1$ to operate on organ(s) $k_2$ of patient $m_2$, as a treatment for ailment $m_3$.
$k_1$ is an operating theatre in which to perform surgery $m_4$.
$x_1$ is a citron (Citrus medica) of type $x_2$
$x_1$=$s_1$ (mass of facts) is medical science based on methodology $x_2$=$s_3$.
$x_1$ is an instance/dose/quantity of medication/medicine/drug $x_2$ for treating ailment $m_3$.
$n_1$ is an instruction for $n_2$=$m_3$ (event/state) to occur, issued by $n_3$=$m_1$ for intended recipient $n_4$=$m_2$.
$v_1$ is a command word/keyword ordering $v_2$=$m_3$ (event/state) in language $v_3$.
$m_1$=$c_1$ demands/exacts $c_2$=$m_3$ of $c_3$=$m_2$, with manner/form of demand $c_4$.
$m_1$=$xa_2$=$p_1$ commands/orders to $m_2$ using hand (gesture) $xa_1$=$p_2$ to do/bring about $m_3$.
$x_1$=$m_1$=$c_1$ expresses/states command $x_2$=$c_2$ to recipient(s) $x_3$=$m_2$=$c_3$ via expressive medium $x_4$=$c_4$.
$m_3$ of {minde} (the desired result) is presumably cointained in he expression of the command.  $x_1$ commands $x_3$ with expression $x_2$.
A block of ciphertext. See also {selmifsle}. m3 is not necessarily a block cipher; it could be a byte stream cipher, in which case s1 is a byte. Also, codon; see {mivmifsle}.
$x_1$=$c_1$ is a machine gun for use against $x_2$ by $x_3$, launching projectile $c_2$ propelled by $c_3$.
$c_1$ is technology-oriented science fiction about plot/theme/subject $c_2$ by author $c_3$, based on technology $l_1$.
$d_1$ (individual, mass) performs robot dance/dances like a machine to accompaniment/music/rhythm $d_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a meal with meal dish $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a diameter between $x_2$ and $x_3$ of $x_4$.
$x_1$ (text) is a particle connecting two parts of a construct and belonging to word class $x_2$
$m_1$ is the middle of fall/autumn [harvest/cooling season] of year $c_2$ at location $c_3$
From la berenstein cribe 2020/11/17 See also {midju}, {critu}

Like, for example, the sound of {ybu} in mijykemkarsna. See also {galmijykemkarsna}, {norgalmijykemkarsna}, {dizmijykemkarsna}, {rixykemkarsna}, {crakemkarsna}, {galkemkarsna}, {norgalkemkarsna}, {dizykemkarsna}, {tebykemkarsna}, {naltebykemkarsna}, {karsna}, {voksna}, {ra'isna}, {relkarsna}, {zunsna}.
$x_1$ is the middle mouse button of computer mouse $x_2$.
$x_1$ is located in the middle of $x_2$

Microwave ovens use electromagnetic waves of ~2.45 GHz frequency.

For use with metric time system.
$g_1$ is $g_2$ micrograms in mass (default is 1) by standard $g_3$.

$mit_1$=$mil_1$ is $mit_2$=$mil_1$ (one by default) millimeter(s) in length

The ordering rule is simply the order of the arguments, the unordered set is the set with members x2, x3, x4, ...

Each commander must demand the same event ($x_3$) to happen, demanding it of the next person in the chain (including, but possibly not ending with, $x_2$). This word is a {brapagjvo} of "{minde}" + ".{utka}"; slightly malformed because "minde" is not a binary, as ".utka" requires.
$c_1$=$j_1$ adds/says/expresses $c_2$=$j_2$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept) to audience $c_3$ via expressive medium $c_4$ following/adding to $j_3$ (sedu'u/text/lu'e concept)
From la berenstein cribe 2020/11/17 See also {jmina}, {cusku}
$x_1$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of krypton (Kr).
$s_1$ (place) hides $m_2$=$s_2$ from $m_3$ by method $m_4$; $s_1$ is a hiding place.
$tu_1$=$m_2$ is a bug used by $ti_1$=$m_1$ to listen to $ti_2$ without $mi_3$ being aware.
$p_1$=$m_1$=$m_2$ sneaks through $p_2$ from $p_3$ to $p_4$, hidden from $m_3$
$f_1$=$m_1$ secretly opposes $f_2$=$m_3$ regarding $f_3$ (abstract) with secrecy method $m_4$.

A smaller x2 means less caring. Use of vague numbers is obviously permitted. (Why not?) "Barely give a shit" (= "gleua li so'u") "Doesn't give a fuck" (= "gleua li no"). Numbers can be made to lujvo with this to create pseudo-words meaning "to give no fucks" (= "no zei gleua"). Of course, this word can be used positively (= "gleua li so'e") to mean something like "I care a great deal!"
Of course, you can write "glexaso" as "gle69".
